price: Na wanao jitetea baada ya kudhulumiwa, hao hapana njia ya kuwalaumu.
arabic: وَلَمَنِ ٱنتَصَرَ بَعۡدَ ظُلۡمِهِۦ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَا عَلَيۡهِم مِّن سَبِيلٍ
footnotes: Hakika wanao wapa adhabu wavamizi kama wanavyo fanya uadui wao, hao hawaingiliwi wala hawalaumiwi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walamani intaṣara baʿda ẓul'mihi fa-ulāika mā ʿalayhim min sabīlin
